mapper.insert: insert into MGV_USER (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_birth) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_birth as birth, user_email as email, user_create_date as createDate, user_update_date as updateDate from MGV_USER where user_id = #{value}
